com.topcoder.util.file.fieldconfig
Class NodeList

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.util.file.fieldconfig.NodeList
Direct Known Subclasses:
TemplateFields
public class NodeList
extends java.lang.Object

An immutable list of nodes used for better handling of the nodes (fields and loops) within a loop.

Thread-Safety: This class is immutable and therefore thread-safe.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.1
Author:
adic, roma, ShindouHikaru, biotrail
